title: Hay Hay Hay 3! Fertilizing the Hay & Cattle Pastures! and our new 4th of July Calf!

tasks.task: Driving and operating a fertilizer spreader to apply fertilizer to fields.
subtasks: Loading the granular fertilizer into the hopper.
Aligning the fertilizer trailer with the skid steer.
Activating the locking mechanism on the trailer to engage the fertilizer spreader.
Monitoring the gate opening to control the flow rate (200 pounds per acre).
Adjusting the speed of the vehicle (5-7 mph) to achieve the desired application rate.

tasks.task: Driving through the fields to spread fertilizer evenly.
subtasks: Navigating around obstacles and field rows while driving.

tasks.task: Checking for new calves and ear tagging them.
subtasks: Identifying new calves born to the herd.
Retrieving ear tags and inserting them into the calves.

tasks.task: Returning the rented fertilizer spreader buggy to the co-op.
subtasks: Operating the buggy to drive back to the coop before closing.
Operating the brush hog equipment to cut vegetation.
